factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

scriptLines: source1 derive(category_name = iif(isNull(category_name), 'Sin categoría', category_name)) ~> derivedColumn1

transformations.name: filter1
transformations.description: Agregue una expresión para el filtro.

scriptLines: opened_clean = iif( isNull(opened_year) || !isInteger(opened_year, '####', 'en-US'), toInteger('0', '####', 'en-US'), toInteger(opened_year, '####', 'en-US') )) ~> derivedColumn1
